mapper.select: SELECT D1.*, C.*,C.CODE_NAME AS JOB_NAME, O.CODE_NAME AS POSITION_NAME, E.*,EXTRACT(YEAR FROM TO_DATE(SUBSTR(EMP_RESIDENT_NO,1,2),'RR')) || '년' || SUBSTR(EMP_RESIDENT_NO,3,INSTR(EMP_RESIDENT_NO,'-')-5) || '월' || SUBSTR(EMP_RESIDENT_NO,5,2) || '일' AS EMP_BIRTH_DATE, WOT.CODE_NAME AS WORK_TYPE_NAME, WOS.CODE_NAME AS WORK_STATUS_NAME, WOP.CODE_NAME AS WORK_PATTERN_NAME, AUT.CODE_NAME AS AUT_NAME FROM (SELECT * FROM TBL_EMPLOYEE) E LEFT JOIN TBL_DEPARTMENT D1 ON D1.DEPT_CODE=E.DEPT_CODE LEFT JOIN TBL_CODE C ON E.JOB_CODE = C.CODE_NO LEFT JOIN TBL_CODE O ON E.POSITION_CODE = O.CODE_NO LEFT JOIN TBL_CODE WOT ON E.WORK_TYPE_CODE = WOT.CODE_NO LEFT JOIN TBL_CODE WOS ON E.WORK_STATUS = WOS.CODE_NO LEFT JOIN TBL_CODE WOP ON E.WORK_PATTERN = WOP.CODE_NO LEFT JOIN TBL_CODE AUT ON E.AUT_CODE = AUT.CODE_NO WHERE E.USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY E.EMP_NO DESC

SELECT SEQ_EMP_NO.NEXTVAL AS EMP_NO FROM DUAL
